name: Paragraph
description:
Paragraph is a semantic component used for blocks of text with
semantic meaning.

Paragraph accepts all the same customization options as Text.

languages.javascriptreact:
<Paragraph>
  Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by Irish author Bram Stoker. It
  introduced the character of Count Dracula and established many conventions of
  subsequent vampire fantasy. The novel tells the story of Dracula's attempt
  to move from Transylvania to England so that he may find new blood and spread
  the undead curse, and of the battle between Dracula and Professor Abraham Van
  Helsing.
</Paragraph>;
languages.html: Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by Irish author Bram Stoker. It introduced the character of Count Dracula and established many conventions of subsequent vampire fantasy. The novel tells the story of Dracula's attempt to move from Transylvania to England so that he may find new blood and spread the undead curse, and of the battle between Dracula and Professor Abraham Van Helsing.

ext_com_draculaui_variations.html:

green

ext_com_draculaui_variations.html:
Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by Irish author Bram Stoker. It introduced the character of Count Dracula and established many conventions of subsequent vampire fantasy. The novel tells the story of Dracula's attempt to move from Transylvania to England so that he may find new blood and spread the undead curse, and of the battle between Dracula and Professor Abraham Van Helsing.

Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by Irish author Bram Stoker. It introduced the character of Count Dracula and established many conventions of subsequent vampire fantasy. The novel tells the story of Dracula's attempt to move from Transylvania to England so that he may find new blood and spread the undead curse, and of the battle between Dracula and Professor Abraham Van Helsing.

The novel tells the story of Dracula's attempt to move from Transylvania to England so that he may find new blood and spread the undead curse, and of the battle between Dracula and Professor Abraham Van Helsing.

The novel tells the story of Dracula's attempt to move from Transylvania to England so that he may find new blood and spread the undead curse, and of the battle between Dracula and Professor Abraham Van Helsing.
ext_com_draculaui_variations.react:
<Box>
  <Paragraph align="left">
    Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by Irish author Bram Stoker. It
    introduced the character of Count Dracula and established many conventions
    of subsequent vampire fantasy. The novel tells the story of Dracula's
    attempt to move from Transylvania to England so that he may find new blood
    and spread the undead curse, and of the battle between Dracula and Professor
    Abraham Van Helsing.
  </Paragraph>
  <Paragraph align="center">
    Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by Irish author Bram Stoker. It
    introduced the character of Count Dracula and established many conventions
    of subsequent vampire fantasy. The novel tells the story of Dracula's
    attempt to move from Transylvania to England so that he may find new blood
    and spread the undead curse, and of the battle between Dracula and Professor
    Abraham Van Helsing.
  </Paragraph>
  <Paragraph align="right">
    Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by Irish author Bram Stoker. It
    introduced the character of Count Dracula and established many conventions
    of subsequent vampire fantasy. The novel tells the story of Dracula's
    attempt to move from Transylvania to England so that he may find new blood
    and spread the undead curse, and of the battle between Dracula and Professor
    Abraham Van Helsing.
  </Paragraph>
  <Paragraph align="justify">
    Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by Irish author Bram Stoker. It
    introduced the character of Count Dracula and established many conventions
    of subsequent vampire fantasy. The novel tells the story of Dracula's
    attempt to move from Transylvania to England so that he may find new blood
    and spread the undead curse, and of the battle between Dracula and Professor
    Abraham Van Helsing.
  </Paragraph>
</Box>;
ext_com_draculaui_variations.docs: Paragraphs can be customized with different alignments.

ext_com_draculaui_variations.title: Weights
ext_com_draculaui_variations.html:
normal

semibold

bold
ext_com_draculaui_variations.docs: Paragraphs can be defined in different font weights.

ext_com_draculaui_variations.title: Sizes
ext_com_draculaui_variations.html:
xs

sm

md

lg
ext_com_draculaui_variations.docs: Paragraphs can be customized to use several different sizes.

ext_com_draculaui_variations.title: Line Height
ext_com_draculaui_variations.html:
xs

Zombie ipsum reversus ab viral inferno, nam rick grimes malum cerebro. De carne lumbering animata corpora quaeritis. Summus brains sit​​, morbo vel maleficia? De apocalypsi gorger omero undead survivor dictum mauris. Hi mindless mortuis soulless creaturas, imo evil stalking monstra adventus resi dentevil vultus comedat cerebella viventium. Qui animated corpse, cricket bat max brucks terribilem incessu zomby. The voodoo sacerdos flesh eater, suscitat mortuos comedere carnem virus. Zonbi tattered for solum oculi eorum defunctis go lum cerebro.

ext_com_draculaui_variations.docs: Paragraphs can be controlled with different line heights.

size.description: Controls the size of the text based on pre-configured Dracula UI sizes.
size.name: size

weight.description: Controls the weight of the text.
weight.name: weight

lineHeight.description: Controls the line height of a text.
lineHeight.name: lineHeight

color.description: Controls the color of the text
color.name: color

as.description: The HTML element to be used
as.name: as

ext_com_draculaui_docgen.description:
Paragraph is a semantic component used for blocks of text with
semantic meaning.

Paragraph accepts all the same customization options as Text.

size.description: Controls the size of the text based on pre-configured Dracula UI sizes.
size.name: size

weight.description: Controls the weight of the text.
weight.name: weight

lineHeight.description: Controls the line height of a text.

color.description: Controls the color of the text

as.description: The HTML element to be used
